name: Dogs Attack
description:
Protect yourself from attacking evil dogs! You are attacked and you need to protect yourself and your tower.
The game is completely free, but you can buy items for faster passing of the game.

Tips for the game:
- Click on the enemy to aim and start shooting.
- Drag the explosives to monsters, do not forget about the timer.
- Choose the right weapon on the fly.
"Buy cartridges for weapons."
- Collect coins and ammunition, which fall out from enemies.
- Move your finger across the screen to change the view side.
- Improve weapons to use it more effectively.
- Improve tower defense.
